title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Greg Olsen on Russ Trade, Broncos Upside, Rodgers Green Bay Return
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Greg Olsen on Russ Trade, Broncos Upside, Rodgers Green Bay Return
description:
First, (3:00) Colin explains why the Seahawks trading Russell Wilson is the latest sign of an organization in decline, what Aaron Rodgers' decision to stay in Green Bay says about his priorities, and why Russell Westbrook shouldn't get to play the innocent victim after recent harsh media criticism.

Then, Fox NFL Analyst and 14-year NFL tight end Greg Olsen and Colin discuss why the Broncos are everything Russell Wilson was looking for (18:00), if the Seahawks got enough assets in return (22:00), why Greg was unimpressed with Seattle's offensive scheme during his season with the team (25:00), when he realized Wilson was different than any QB he had ever player with (23:00), why Aaron Rodgers ultimately decided to stay in Green Bay (30:00), if the NFL has become too reliant on elite QB's (34:00), how Greg has made the transition from player to up and coming broadcaster (44:00), and why his role as a sports dad led to him starting his podcast about the myriad of issues in youth sports (48:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
